com.konakartadmin.app

Class AdminDBConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.konakartadmin.app.AdminDBConnector

  • public class AdminDBConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all of the parameters needed to connect to a DB

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean connected
      Set to true if the connection was successful
      private java.lang.String connectionString
      The db connection string
      private java.lang.String driver
      The driver for the db connection
      private java.lang.String errorMsg
      Error message from the db if the connection attempt was unsuccessful
      private java.lang.String password
      The password for the db connection
      private java.lang.String user
      The user name for the db connection
